name: Critical Skunk
description: Critical Skunk is a hybrid bred by Mr. Nice Seeds and parented by Skunk #1 and Afghani. Successful in all environments, growers can expect flowers between 6 and 9 weeks.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Creative, Hungry, Aroused, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Cramps, Depression, Dry Mouth
